task.title: Integrate Katalon Studio with Microsoft Teams

taskbody.context: To integrate with Microsoft Teams, do as follows:

step.cmd: Install our plugin from the Katalon Store: Microsoft Teams Integration.
Open Katalon Studio and select Your Account > Reload Plugins. For detailed instructions, see: .

On your Microsoft Teams channel, create an Incoming Webhook to allow to share content in Microsoft Teams channels. For better notification management, you might want to enter Katalon Studio as your Incoming Webhook connection. For detailed instructions, see the Microsoft document: Create Incoming Webhooks.
step.info: set incoming webhookCopy and save the unique webhook URL present in the dialog window. The URL maps to the channel and you can use it to send information to Teams.

step.cmd: Open . Go to Project Setting > Plugins > Microsoft Teams.
Enter the Incoming Webhook URL, then click Apply and Close.

taskbody.result: After the configuration, whenever an execution in is finished, your Microsoft Teams channel will automatically receive the summary execution result.MS team reports
